The Rise and Rise of Bitcoin (O surgimento e ascensão do Bitcoin) foi lançado no ano de 2014, dirigido e roteirizado pelos irmãos Mross, o documentário narra a história de Daniel, um programador que se apaixona no ano de 2011 pela criptomoeda bitcoin.

> [quantumkitty](#comment_383_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): Freedom is a very useless word to use in this scenario. I don't have the freedom to walk up to my neighbour and shoot him in the face. Not everything in this world is black and white. Yeah if you want to see people getting murdered and child porn you can go to Kopykate 2. I just don't think that fighting for the right to distribute a murderer's footage and child pornography is a freedom worth fighting for.

I don't fight for anything but FREEDOM.

There is no half freedom, I just think it's EACH problem to see something or not, whether the person likes it and IS NOT HURTING other people, their problem.

Not mine, except if I do not like something in zeronet, just go there to block user and READY, never see what the guy put, do not think the solution is the site itself, block the content.

By the way big kopy kate 2, there is only THANKS to your work, I thank you in advance, even though it is not my site, I think your work and I think FUCK, you block on YOUR SITE, who you want.

And I think the best option would be EVERY one to have a copy of the site and then whoever wants to access the copy of that individual that he allows or not X thing.

The good thing about zeronet is that you have TOTAL freedom, ON YOUR SITE.

The only real way for us at zeronet to exercise our freedom is to do as you did, create your site or clone if you wanted and then post on our own site.

In the case of Big Kopy Kate 2, I saw a crazy posting who would own it and would not block or delete anything, now IF he will do it, I HAVE NO IDEA.

But in advance thank you for returning to zeronet, thank you very much.

If you want, please add support for more decentralized logins, thanks

There is and my "political" view is libertarianism, anarcocapitalism.

And if it's any video of my son or daughter, I hope the guy has learned to disappear from the ground, because I'll find the guy and KILL the guy who does this to my son or daughter, without his consent.

So I don't worry, I know what I'll do if something bad happens to any son or daughter of mine.

Now if the two wanted to have sex, I don't care, I always thought that, even when I was little and my father asked to take care of my sister, tell him to warn her, in front of her and speak clearly, I'll just get in or defend her, IF they try to attack, rape her.

Now, if she wants to or keep giving ball to other boys, as is normal with girls and some brothers, they would want to fight.

I've never been like this, I've always been supportive, everyone knows what's right and IF the guy rapes my sister, son, daughter, I just kill.

I'm going to go to jail, but the bad guy will be killed first.

por isto mesmo, não me importo, pois não quero tirar o direito da pessoa postar QUALQUER coisa, eu não ligo.

E se for algum video de algum filhoe ou filha meu, espero que o cara tenha aprendido a sumir da terra, pois vou achar o cara e MATAR o cara que fizer isto com um filho ou filha minha, SEM SEU CONSENTIMENTO.

Por isto não me preocupo, eu sei o que vou fazer se acontecer algo de ruim a algum filho ou filha meu.

Agora se os dois quiseram transar, não ligo, sempre pensei assim, até mesmo quando era pequeno e meu pai pedia para cuidar da minha irmã , avisa para ele avisar ela, na frente dela e falava claramente, só vou me meter ou defender ela , SE tentarem atacar, estuprar ela.

Agora , se ela quiser ou ficar dando bola para outros meninos , como é normal das meninas e alguns irmãos, ficavam querendo brigar.

Eu nunca fui assim, sempre fui favoravel a cada um sabe o que é certo e SE o cara estuprar minha irmã, filho, filha , simplesmente mato.

Vou ir preso, mas o bandido , vai ser morto antes.
